attributes.action: Introduce a Drink Container Deposit Scheme.
attributes.background:
Automatic machines can recognize the container and return a deposit, say 10 pence.    On Wednesday August 8 Victorian Parliament will vote on introducing a container deposit scheme. We can be something similar.
 In the first 6 months of New South Wales' scheme 196 MILLION containers were recycled.

rejection.details:
The Government has announced plans for a deposit return scheme, so we're not sure what further action you'd like to see.

You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/deposit-return-scheme-in-fight-against-plastic
